We’ve done the work for you. [/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Apply For Multiple Jobs With One Click!” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:18px|text_align:left|line_height:26px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” custom_font_weight=”fw-700″ letter_spacing=”0.05em” link=”url:%23|||” el_class=”color-primary”][vc_column_text]A unique feature in Recruitment Agency theme is the one-click application of jobs in the basket. You can add multiple jobs in the basket and providing the candidate has uploaded their CV then they can simply apply for all the jobs in their basket at once.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1489725908221{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1489725762575{padding-top: 0px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_single_image image=”854″ img_size=”full” css_animation=”fadeInLeft”][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1489725768758{padding-right: 120px !important;padding-left: 45px !important;}” el_class=”rm-padding-sm”][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Candidate Profile Interface” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:42px|text_align:left|line_height:68px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” custom_font_weight=”fw-700″ letter_spacing=”0.05em” link=”url:%23|||” el_class=”color-primary”][vc_column_text]The candidate profile page contains everything a candidate needs to get applying for jobs.
